description_0: A medium-close-up view of a bright neon tennis ball that is spherical. Along the middle of the tennis ball, there is a white line that is curved, the line runs vertically, and the top portion of the line is curved slightly to the right, while the bottom portion of the line curves slightly to the right. The ball is placed on a blue surface, and above and to the left there are two small brow leaves. It is daytime, and the shadow of the ball can be seen below the ball as well as to the right.
description_1: An outdoor daytime angled down medium close-up view of two neon yellow tennis balls placed side by side with about two inches of separation between them. The tennis balls are slightly fuzzy due to being used, and are placed on top of a blue ground floor. The blue ground floor has small chips and markings throughout its surface and a long diagonal crack towards the top left. There is extremely small natural debris scattered throughout the blue ground floor as well.
